ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] spell problems
ygData.msgSnippet: that would work or you could use a social button and use the /Cast (number of spell slot) i.e /cast 1 to cast the spell in the first slot that way u can add in
ygData.messageBody:
that would work or you could use a social button and use the /Cast (number of spell slot)

i.e /cast 1 to cast the spell in the first slot

that way u can add in things like warnings or other skills like sense heading :)

>From: "Su"
>Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>To:

>Date: Mon, 2 Sep 2002 16:29:32 -0500
>
>
>Do you first put them in the book, and then put them in the spell mem slots?
>Then you can hold the left mouse cursor down over them and place them in the
>hotkeys.
>luv,
>-Su
